Vendor Search Templates

Copy-paste regex patterns for vendor inventory searches (3.14+ feature)

How to use: Copy the pattern and paste it into the vendor search box (ctrl+v). Items matching the pattern will be highlighted with a yellow border.

Movement Speed Boots

Common socket color combinations for movement speed boots. Click to copy the search string.

MS Boots - 3 Blue Sockets

Movement speed boots with 3 blue sockets (vendor regex)

"nt speed".*"b-b-b"

MS Boots - 3 Green Sockets

Movement speed boots with 3 green sockets (vendor regex)

"nt speed".*"g-g-g"

MS Boots - 3 Red Sockets

Movement speed boots with 3 red sockets (vendor regex)

"nt speed".*"r-r-r"

MS Boots - 2 Blue 1 Green

Movement speed boots with 2 blue, 1 green socket (vendor regex)

"nt speed".*"b-b-g|g-b-b|b-g-b"

MS Boots - 2 Green 1 Blue

Movement speed boots with 2 green, 1 blue socket (vendor regex)

"nt speed".*"g-g-b|b-g-g|g-b-g"

MS Boots - 2 Red 1 Green

Movement speed boots with 2 red, 1 green socket (vendor regex)

"nt speed".*"r-r-g|g-r-r|r-g-r"

MS Boots - 2 Green 1 Red

Movement speed boots with 2 green, 1 red socket (vendor regex)

"nt speed".*"g-g-r|r-g-g|g-r-g"

Common Searches

Frequently used search patterns for various gear types.

Chaos Recipe Items (60-74)

Rare items level 60-74 for chaos recipe

"rare".*"item level: ([6][0-9]|[7][0-4])"

6-Link Items

Items with 6 linked sockets

"sockets: ([rgbw]-?){6}"

6-Socket Items

Items with 6 sockets (vendor for 7 jewellers)

"sockets: ([rgbw].?){6}"

Quality 10%+ Items

Items with 10%+ quality

"quality: \+([1-9][0-9])"

RGB Linked Items

Items with red-green-blue linked for chromatic orb

"r-g-b|r-b-g|g-r-b|g-b-r|b-r-g|b-g-r"

High Life Items (70+)

Items with 70+ life rolls

"([1-9]\d{2,}|[7-9]\d).+life"
